topic.title: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (REPORTING PERIOD END)
topic.shortdesc: PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (REPORTING PERIOD END) is derived from PERSONS ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE (LAST DAY OF PREVIOUS REPORTING PERIOD), PERSONS NEWLY ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE and PERSONS NO LONGER ELIGIBLE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE.
